attributes.action: Instruct the appropriate Secretary of State to Reverse the recent rejection of Coventry Airport's planning application for a passenger terminal to accommodate the Airport's passenger capacity as outlined in the 2003 White Paper - namely 2 million passengers per anum
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The saga of the above planning application has been characterised by unjustified obstruction by the Local Authority's Planning Department and the prostitution of democracy in the inordinate weight given to minority groups with small support and loud mouths.
Any concept of Fair play and Justice DEMANDS that this cappricious decision - effectively a "BUNG" to Birmingham Airport be REVERSED not just Rescinded
